context_notes: Dip in production due to poor QB play and limited scheme. Not a red flag. Chicago added Colston Loveland (Top 10 pick TE) and Rome Odunze (Top 10 pick WR), making the target competition fierce.
future_ceiling_summary: Potential WR1 if usage holds. Needs to overcome heavy target competition in a talented young offense.

context_notes: Plays both ways, dynamic athlete, rare profile. Jaguars lost Christian Kirk, Evan Engram, and Gabe Davis. Minimal target competition beyond Brian Thomas Jr. (Top 20 pick).
future_ceiling_summary: Paradox player. Projects as instant-impact WR1. Elite fantasy upside if Jaguars use him creatively.
